Name: Frothing Mad
Description: Attacks gain +1 boon and can critical hit (+[D]). Always attempts to focus on the closest foe. Can choose if multiple characters are close.

Name: Great Strength
Description: The Demolisher's abilities have Collide: Foe is dazed. Dazed foes take [D].

Name: Blood Drain
Description: Attacks ignore vigor against bloodied foes and gain +1 boon.

Name: Clinging Mists
Description: The Nocturnal has aura 2. If there are no other characters in the aura, it gains stealth at the end of its turn, and has evasion.

Name: Hunter in the Mist
Description: Attacks are a critical hit (+[D]) against characters with no allies or allied summons adjacent.

Name: Looming Shadow
Description: The Master has aura 1. The space is difficult terrain for hostile characters and allied characters spend 0 movement to cross spaces in the area.

Name: Lurk in the Shadows
Description: The Master is intangible. Characters can pass through and end their turn in its space. If all its summons are destroyed, it is immediately forced into phase II, placing any characters sharing its space into free adjacent spaces, or as close as possible.

Name: Summon Minion
Description: When starting combat in this phase, or when entering it, summons 4 minions per player character, which can be placed in any space on the battlefield not adjacent to a character.

Summons.Name: Minion
Summons.SummonActions: Once a round, at the start of the Master's turn, the Master may move all minions 3 spaces.
Summons.SummonEffects: Characters take 2 piercing damage, once, for every minion they start their turn adjacent to, then are shoved 1 in a direction of the Master's choice.

Name: Aftermath
Description: After Elden Chaos activates, destroy all rock spires and clear all eruptions.

Name: Cataclysm
Description: At the start and end of the round create 2 rock spires, height 1 objects, in free space within range 2 of a foe.

Name: Elden Chaos
Description:
At the end of the round, the Razer fires a beam of pure ancient chaos. The beam is a 3 wide line area effect that crosses through all obstacles, terrain, and goes across the whole battlefield. Characters in the area must save. On a failed save, they take 2[D]+fray, 3 times. On a successful save, then take it only once. Characters in cover gain +1 boon on the save.
If the round is 6 or higher, this deals maximum damage.

Name: Radiance
Description: When this phase triggers, remove the Razer from the battlefield, then place them in the center of the battlefield, or as close as possible. On their turn, they can dash 1 space, but otherwise can't make any other movement. All characters not in cover from the Razer take 3 Divine damage at the end of their turns.
